amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Advanced Technology Program by $43 million and transfer $19.5 million of that amount for grants under the Edward Byrne Memorial State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Advanced Technology Program by $43 million and transfer $19.5 million of that amount for grants under the Edward Byrne Memorial State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance Programs.

action.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 267 (Roll No. 384).
